title: Drawing, "The southern part of Berchtesgaden, Bavaria", June 1868
description: The street leading to the Franciscan Church and to the gateway to the Court House which are shown in the left middle distance. The roofs of the houses of the quarter west of it are shown in the right foreground and middle distance. The Watzmann rises in the right background, the Schoenfeld Spitze in the central far distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The southern part of Berchtesgaden, Bavaria", June 1868.
June 1868. Graphite, oil on paperboard. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-506-a.
